amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $10 million and increases funds for Gulf War illness research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $10,000,000 and to increase funds for the Defense Health Program by a the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Grayson.
